thread.title: Ground News - People urged to seek advice as energy bills set to rise again on New Year's Day
thread.title_full: Ground News - People urged to seek advice as energy bills set to rise again on New Year's Day

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - People urged to seek advice as energy bills set to rise again on New Year's Day
text:
Summary by Ground News Ofgem price cap will rise from £1834 to £1928 a jump of £94 for the average bill. Raising the cap means energy providers can charge more for gas an electricity from January 1. Ofgem attributed the need for the cap to rise to the rising cost of wholesale gas as a result of world events. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Glasgow Times Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Gannett People urged to seek advice as energy bills set to rise again on New Year's Day Gas and electric bills will rise in the New Year as the new price cap is put in place.
30 minutes ago · Glasgow, United Kingdom Read Full Article
